name: Dicey Football
description:
Assign dice to activate your athletes' abilities! Move balls to your opponent's endzone to score. Win dice rolls to power through opponents, or maneuver around them and kick it in.

Play against a friend or the computer. Press 'R' to restart. Available as executable download for proper fullscreen mode.

Instructions: Click and drag dice to appropriate dice slots associated with each athlete. Then, click on a highlighted square to perform the action. Repeat until out of dice.

Designed and developed by Dan Schumacher. 

Made in 48 hours for GMTK Jam 2022. Art assets from game-icons.net.
